sentences.en: A person who cheats is an unworthy winner.
sentences.cn: 以欺诈手段取胜的人不配做胜利者.

sentences.en: Ch'u Shen - ming said, " I'm unworthy!
sentences.cn: 褚慎明道: “ 岂敢,岂敢!

sentences.en: He considered himself unworthy of the honour they had bestowed on him.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己不配得到大家赋予他的荣誉。

sentences.en: He is unworthy to receive such honor.
His accusations are unworthy of a prime minister.
sentences.cn: 他的指责与其首相身份不相称。

sentences.en: I feel unworthy of the precious gift you have bestowed on me.
Industry and finance seem to him to be activities unworthy of gentlemen.
sentences.cn: 工业和金融在他看来都是绅士们不屑一顾的行当.

sentences.en: It is unworthy of it to be cramped.
Miss Melville could not resist asking, although she knew it was unworthy of her.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔小姐忍不住问起来，虽然她知道自己不该问。

sentences.en: Such a remark is unworthy of notice.
The offender is extruded as unworthy of an honorable calling.
sentences.cn: 违者将以不配从事光荣职业而被除名.

sentences.en: Unworthy buildings should be demolished to make room for modern construction.
sentences.cn: 无价值的房屋应予以拆除,为现代建筑腾出地盘.

sentences.en: We must never be unworthy of our teachers'untiring and sincere teachings.
sentences.cn: 我们决不要辜负老师的谆谆教导.

sentences.en: What was cried up by the wily merchant often turned out to be most unworthy of praise.
sentences.cn: 凡是那位奸商所大声赞扬的,往往是最一钱不值的.

sentences.en: You may feel unworthy of the attention and help people offer you.
sentences.cn: 你可能会觉得自己不值得别人关心和帮助。

words.tran_cn: 不相称地；可耻地；不值得尊敬地；无价值地
不值得的；无价值的；不相称的

trans.tran_cn: 不值得的，无价值的，不合适的，可恶的，卑劣的
